Re-Elect Mary “Ann” Motte 4 MSJC Trustee/Area 4 - Debate

October 14th, 2014

FYI  U-Tube Video Debate Sponsored by Lake Elsinore Citizens Committee on October 7, 2014

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X6mxQ-DD8Vs

“Experienced Leadership You Can Trust”

Your Voice at the Board Table for Students & Taxpayers to:

1)  Increase Access/College Going Rates

2)  Double Enrollments; Maximize Facilities in Scheduling

3)  Control Administrative & Legal Costs

4)  Increase Full-Time Faculty HIres

Endorsements:

Riverside County Supervisor Marion Ashley;

Republican Party of Riverside County;

City of Perris Mayor, Daryl Busch
